## SavedObjectsCreatePointInTimeFinderOptions.searchBehavior property

Controls the search behavior of the `find` function:

\* `'searchAfter'`<!-- -->: sort the results by updated\_at, and iterate through results using the last hit sort value \* `'page'`<!-- -->: do not sort the results, and instead iterate through the results in sequential pages

Default: `'searchAfter'`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
searchBehavior?: 'searchAfter' | 'page';
```
